title: Director
description:
Job Description: Director – Engagement Lead  

  

Thryve Digital Health LLP is an emerging global healthcare partner that delivers strategic innovation, expertise, and flexibility to its healthcare partners. Being a US healthcare conglomerate captive, we have direct access to deeper insights that help us accelerate our learning process and keeps us ahead of the curve. Thryve delivers next-generation solutions that enable our healthcare partners to provide positive experiences to their consumers.  

  

Our global collaborative of healthcare, operations, and IT experts creates innovative and sustainable processes for our clients, which keeps the ever-evolving consumers engaged and assists them in managing the future of their healthcare better. We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. Thryve is an equal opportunity employer and places a high value on integrity, diversity, and inclusion in the organization. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute. For more information about the organization, please visit www.thryvedigital.com.  

  

Role Summary:  

An Engagement Lead typically oversees project management, ensuring effective communication between teams and clients. Responsibilities may include stakeholder engagement, project planning, and facilitating collaboration to achieve project goals. Strong leadership, communication, and organizational skills are crucial for success in this role.
  

Responsibilities  

* Build and maintain relationships with clients, team members, and other stakeholders to ensure clear communication and understanding of project objectives.
* Develop comprehensive project plans, outlining tasks, timelines, and resource requirements. Ensure alignment with client expectations and organizational goals.
* Lead and motivate cross-functional teams, fostering a collaborative environment. Delegate tasks, set expectations, and monitor progress to ensure project milestones are met.
* Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, addressing inquiries, providing updates, and managing expectations. Strive to exceed client satisfaction through effective communication and problem-solving.
* Identify potential risks and challenges within the project, developing mitigation strategies to minimize disruptions. Proactively address issues to keep the project on track.
* Ensure that project deliverables meet high-quality standards. Implement and oversee quality assurance processes to guarantee client satisfaction.
* Optimize resource allocation based on project requirements, ensuring efficiency and effectiveness. Monitor resource utilization and make adjustments as needed.
* Manage project budgets, tracking expenses, and ensuring financial objectives are met. Provide regular financial updates to clients and senior management.
* Maintain accurate and up-to-date project documentation, including progress reports, meeting minutes, and any relevant project artifacts. Provide regular updates to key stakeholders.
* Act decisively to address challenges and conflicts within the project. Implement solutions to keep the project moving forward smoothly.
* Foster a culture of continuous improvement, seeking opportunities to enhance project processes and outcomes. Encourage feedback and implement lessons learned for future projects.
* Navigate changes in project scope, timelines, or requirements with flexibility. Demonstrate adaptability in response to evolving project dynamics.
* Facilitate knowledge transfer within the team, ensuring that insights and best practices are shared to enhance overall project performance.
* Evaluate team members' performance, providing constructive feedback and recognition. Support professional development and growth within the team.
* Ensure that project activities adhere to relevant regulations, policies, and standards. Mitigate legal and compliance risks through vigilant oversight. Identify areas for improvement in processes and contribute to the enhancement of strategic planning methodologies.


Requirements & Qualifications:  

* Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
* Experience: 18 plus years of experience in driving strategic initiatives, Industry capability

development, Delivery Management and Transformation consulting.
  

* Skills: Excellent communication, writing, editing, strong email etiquette, professionalism
  

#### **Short Info**


Posted: 1 day(s) ago
Qualifications: B.E
Experience: 18 Years To 20 Years

title: Director of Engineering
description:
**Engineering Director - D&BA**
===============================

Req ID: 52357
Location:
Bangalore, IN
**Location:** Bangalore, India

  


Sapiens International Corporation (NASDAQ and TASE: SPNS) is a leading global provider of software solutions for the insurance industry, with a growing presence in the financial services sector. We offer integrated core software solutions and business services, and a full digital suite for the property and casualty/general insurance; life, pension, and annuities; and reinsurance markets. Sapiens also services the workers’ compensation and financial and compliance markets.

  


Our portfolio includes policy administration, billing, and claims; underwriting, illustration and electronic application; reinsurance and decision management software. Sapiens’ digital platform features customer and agent portals, and a business intelligence platform. With a 40-year track record of delivering to more than 650+ organizations, Sapiens’ team of over 5,400+ operates through our fully-owned subsidiaries in North America, the United Kingdom, EMEA, and Asia Pacific. For more information: www.sapiens.com.

  


**Job Description: Engineering Director (Data & Analytics Products)**

  

**Experience: 15+ Years**

  

Sapiens Technologies (headquartered in Israel), a leading product development company in the Insurance domain, is looking for a data **Engineering Director** for managing the Data & Analytics products.


As the Data Engineering and Development Director, you will steer organization's technical endeavours in **data management, engineering, architecture design and software development of data and analytics products**. Your multifaceted role encompasses strategic direction, team leadership, and technical innovation, all converging to deliver impactful data-driven solutions that fuel our business growth.


**Experience of leading engineering teams with a focus on Data & Analytics products** is a crucial qualification we seek in potential candidates.

  


**Your main responsibilities will include:**


* **Strategy and Planning:** Develop and execute a comprehensive data engineering and development strategy aligned with the organization's overall goals.
* **Technical Leadership:** Provide visionary technical leadership to data engineering and development teams, fostering innovation and excellence. Stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends, evaluating their potential impact on our data and analytics capabilities.
* **Technical Roadmap:** Engage with executive leadership, cross-functional teams, external partners and customers to define technical roadmap for data and analytics products. Ensure successful & timely release of roadmap items.
* **Collaboration and Communication**:Collaborate with cross-functional teams to seamlessly integrate data products and solutions into business processes. Effectively communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical audiences.
* **Architecture and Design:** Define and design robust architecture for data pipelines, databases, data warehouses, and other data-related infrastructure. Ensure scalability, efficiency, and alignment with evolving business needs.
* **Agile Approach to Data Warehousing & BI**: Implement Agile methodologies for data warehousing and business intelligence product development, fostering adaptability and rapid delivery.
* **Data Integration and ETL/ELT/ML**: Oversee design and implementation of data integration processes, ETL/ELT/ML workflows, and data transformations. Ensure data consistency, quality, and accuracy across the data lifecycle.
* **Delivery & Budget Management:** Manage scope, requirements, and timelines for data engineering and software development projects. Ensure effective project execution, monitor progress, and mitigate risks. Manage the departmental budget, allocate resources effectively, and optimize spending for ROI.
* **Team Management:** Lead recruitment, hiring, onboarding, and training of data engineers, developers, and technical specialists. Foster a culture of collaboration, growth, and technical excellence within the team.
* **Continuous Improvement:** Evaluate existing processes and systems, identifying opportunities for optimization and enhancement – ensuring consistency, efficiency, and quality.
* **Technology/Product Feature Showcase and Presentations**: Conduct / drive webinars and sessions to showcase technical capabilities, product features, and advancements in data & analytics products to internal and external stakeholders.

  




**Desired Skills & Qualification:**


* Master’s degree in computer science/MCA, Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Professional certifications and experience in areas of data engineering, cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark), and project management (PMP, Agile) is desirable.
* Min 15 years of experience within IT space with a strong experience on data engineering, development, and analytics.
* At least 8 to 10 years of firsthand experience in Data Warehousing, Big Data, Business Analytics, Machine Learning, Data visualization tools and relevant technologies is must.
* Proven experience in leading, managing & mentoring cross-functional teams, including data engineers, developers, analysts, and architects is desirable.
* Previous roles in R&D, solution architecture, technical leadership, agile methodologies, and project management are advantageous.
* Experience in contributing to research and development initiatives, innovation projects, and technical advancements can be a significant asset.
* Experience in the insurance domain or relevant industries is preferred.
* Technical proficiency in data engineering, ETL processes, data modelling and design principles (e.g. Inmon/Kimball/Data Volt), database design is good to have.
* Firsthand experience with data integration tools, data pipelines, and workflow orchestration is good to have.
* Strong programming skills in languages like Python, Java, Scala, or SQL are advantageous.
* Effective communication and collaboration skills are expected.

title: Associate Director
description:
**Join a team that is changing millions of lives.**  

Transforming smiles, changing lives.  

At Align Technology, we believe a great smile can transform a person’s life, so we create technology that gives people the confidence to take on whatever’s next. We revolutionized the orthodontic industry with the introduction of the Invisalign system, and we have never lost sight of that spirit of innovation. Our diverse and collaborative teams are constantly pushing the boundaries of what’s possible.  

Ready to join us? **About this opportunity**
The Associate Director - Key Account is responsible for managing the overall business with Key Accounts in India. The person will be responsible for formulating the long-term strategy for the Key Accounts in line with the company’s strategic objectives and for delivering the annual operational plans & targets.


In order to achieve the above, the Associate Director Key Accounts will be accountable for creating detailed key account plans that include but are not limited to; Financial targets, building & establishing strong relationships with key stakeholders within that account, supporting the educational pathways, process changes, forecasting etc. **In this role, you will…**
Financial

* Responsible for formulating and implementing sales strategies to ensure that profitable sales volume and strategic objective targets are met for the assigned key accounts.
* Responsible for regularly follow ups with the key accounts regarding orders and timely collections of the account receivables
* To ensure order to payment cycle is in place as per company policy


Customer

* Will own the overall relationship with the Key Account
* Identify and create customized knowledge pathways for the Key Accounts to create a win-win for both Key Accounts and Invisalign
* Maintain knowledge and awareness of competing products/services, discounting and pricing structures
* Maintain data and information relevant to key accounts for the purpose of conducting analyses that influence account-specific decision making.
* Responsible for identifying and nurturing new accounts for future growth.


Process

* Be the single point of contact for all customer related issues.
* Ensure processes are in place to deliver on commitments to the Key Accounts.
* Ensure processes are in place to deliver on commitments to the Key Accounts.


Strategic Initiatives


* Responsible for driving analysis and implementation of key strategic initiatives and corporate projects.
* Network with business that help support strategic initiatives and foster B2B relationship.
* Responsible for creating business plans and growth projections.


Stake holder

* work closely with the sales, marketing, finance and customer support teams to ensure the end to end objectives are met
* To Analyze market requirements, strategies and formulate annual sales plan with Stake holder for the region
* To explore the market, identify customers and promote the products through individual detailing audio-visual presentations and workshops and to manage local sales & marketing (overall business development) for our brands
* To partnering with cross functional stake holders for achieving business targets
* To identify current market trends including market information to facilitate tender business
* Co-ordinate with the regional liasoning agencies to ensure the timely participation in relevant key opinion leaders
* Identify and develop Institutional Business in Corporate hospitals, liaise with Sales Team to generate demand in Institutions and to facilitate liquidation of stocks, Demonstrate strong problem solving and decision making skills in relation to various customer needs and interest

 **In this role, you’ll need …*** Good **understanding of the medical device/Dental/Healthcare industry** and business knowledge
* **Strong communication skills** to consistently address key accounts’ concerns while offering clear, concise, and understandable responses to their prompts
* Should be able to build **strong working relationships** across functions and teams
* **Analytical Skills** to process raw consumer information and data and translate it into actionable insights such as new sales opportunities and strategies
* Ability to do **basic financial analysis** to be able to identify profitable sales opportunities and the development of financially viable long-term key account plans
* Willingness to travel extensively across the region

**Experience Required for the role :**

* **10 Years of sales experience with strong understanding of Institutional selling in Med Devices or similar Industry, with 2-4 years of experience as Sr. Manager/Associate Director including sales people management**
* **Educational Qualification:** **BA/BSc/ Bio Tech /B.Tech (Desired Qualification –MBA**

 **Sound like a good fit?**
Great! Click the "Apply" link to let us know you are interested. Not the right fit? Don’t worry, Align is quickly growing so we are creating more opportunities to expand our Align family. Please consider joining our Talent Network to receive notifications about future jobs or sharing this opportunity with others in your network. **About Align**
Align Technology is a publicly traded medical device company that is transforming smiles and changing lives. Our global team of talented employees develop innovative technology, tools and treatment options to help dental professionals worldwide achieve the clinical results they expect. Our digital ecosystem combines the power of technology to create beautiful smiles through the integration of AI and machine learning, digital imaging and visualization, biomechanics and material science to develop the Invisalign system, the most advanced clear aligner system in the world; iTero Intraoral Scanners and OrthoCAD digital services. Did you know? Align is the world’s largest manufacturer of custom 3D-printed materials.  

By joining Align, you will be part of a global, fast-growing company in one of the most dynamic industries. Great people, innovative technologies, and meaningful work – these are just some of the things employees say make Align Technology a great place to work.  

We respect your privacy. Please review our Applicant Privacy Policies for additional information. **Global Diversity Statement:**
At Align, we believe in the power of a smile, and we know that every smile is as unique as our employees. As we grow, we will continue building a workforce of diverse cultural backgrounds and life experiences and fostering a culture of open-mindedness and compassion for all our employees. We live our company values by promoting healthy people and healthy communities. All with the intent of changing millions of lives, one unique smile at a time. **Equal Opportunity Statement**
It is our policy to provide equal employment opportunity in all of our employment practices without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, marital status, protected veteran status, age, individuals with disabilities, sexual orientation or gender identity or expression or any other legally protected category. Applicants for positions with Align must be legally authorized to work in the country which they are applying for and verification of employment eligibility will be required as a condition of hire.

title: Research Analyst
description:
We are looking for an Associate Healthcare Research and Data Analyst to join our Med tech Insights team in Bangalore. This is an amazing opportunity to work on syndicated market research reports and custom project for medical device space. The team consists of 48 - 50 people and is reporting to the Director, Med tech Insights. We have great skill sets in market research and forecasting and we would love to speak with you if you have skills in data research & analysis and content generation.
About You – experience, education, skills, and accomplishments* B.Tech/ Master’s degree (MA, MS in life sciences or MBA)/ Pharm D/ PHD
* 0-2 years of relevant job experience
* Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including using pivot tables and advanced formulas such as VLOOKUP, effective data organization strategies etc.
* Highly self-motivated and able to work independently or with a team to produce high quality deliverables that require little rework.
* Strong critical thinking and analytical skills
* Mature communicator capable of handling high-profile clients from Fortune 500 companies
* Strong presentation and written communication skills


It would be great if you also had . . .* Qualification or experience in life sciences will be preferred.
* Well-developed expertise in market research methodologies or related job experience
* Ability to handle tight deadlines.
* Excellent creative problem-solving skills.
* Business acumen that helps support sales success, ongoing improvements, and relationships with internal and external stakeholder.


What will you be doing in this role?* Interviewing industry participants and related medical professionals
* Searching Clarivate's proprietary in-house research repository/library for relevant data
* Using financial, regulatory, and government documents to find key medical approval data.
* Model and forecast medical and healthcare markets, including but not limited to:
* Integrating highly disparate data points into a unified market model
* Interpreting qualitative data into useable quantitative measures
* Creating hypotheses on market and competitive dynamics based on primary and secondary data.
* Using MS Excel and database programs to manipulate large amounts of data.
* Forecasting markets based on expectations, new product developments, and other market disruptors.
* Identifying data trends and outliers using time-series tables and graphs
* Write and prepare comprehensive research reports.


 About the Team
The Med tech Insights team is an essential part of the broader Med tech team’s data-driven culture, and regularly contributes its subject matter expertise to other teams within the organization.
Hours of Work
45 working hours a week, 12:00AM – 09:00PM (IST) and this is a permanent role.
Location - Bangalore
At Clarivate, we are committed to providing equal employment opportunities for all persons with respect to hiring, compensation, promotion, training, and other terms, conditions, and privileges of employment. We comply with applicable laws and regulations governing non-discrimination in all locations.

title: Junior Application Engineer
description:
**About Modelon**


Modelon is revolutionizing the engineering design industry by offering technologies and services that enable customers to leverage system simulation. Modelon’s flagship product, Modelon Impact, is a cloud system simulation platform that helps engineers design, analyze, and simulate physical systems. Our team is dedicated to guiding customers to create innovative technologies.

 **About the Role**


The Junior Application Engineer works directly with the Commercial Team with:

* *Pre-sales commercial engagements* where the prospective client wishes to evaluate Modelon’s technical solutions
* *Post-sales technical suppor**t*
* *Back office work* to handle product releases and licensing infrastructure.


This role covers all Modelon software products and product training, and acts globally across markets and industry sectors. The Junior Application Engineer reports to Modelon’s Senior Business Development Director.


Typical engagements during *pre-sales* that require Junior Application Engineering support include technical presentations, product demonstrations, solution development/scoping and evaluation support.


In the *post-sales* phase, you will deliver timely and high-quality Junior Application Engineering support to Modelon end-users and partners.


In the *back office work* you will work together with the Product Development team to deploy released products and make it available to the Modelon end customers and resellers channels.


You will also help support the Commercial team in handling customer license entitlements and license key generation.

 **Responsibilities and Measurables**

  

* Having a strong understanding of Modelon products and related technology
* Having a strong understanding of Modelon Licensing mechanism
* Following-through on inbound customer technical support requests


Success in this role will primarily be measured by customer satisfaction metrics. Pipeline conversion rate and sales volume will also be important performance metrics that indicate successful pre-sales Junior Application Engineering activities.

 **You are**

* *Customer focused* – you want to wow our customers; you understand that customer satisfaction is critically important to Modelon’s success
* *Disciplined* – you set and communicate clear priorities and objectives; you rely on process to tackle difficult problems
* *Respectful* –you approach issues with an open mind and a desire for both parties to succeed
* *Trusted* – you deliver on commitments or renegotiate early

  



**Requirements**

* MSc in Mechanical, Electric, Engineering Physics with focus on Energy, Automotive or Aerospace applications.
* 0-5 years working experience with 1D mathematical modeling and simulation.
* Knowledge of Python, Modelica, Matlab/Simulink is meritorious.

  

**Application and Contact Details**


This position is based in Trichy, India. We are handling applications as they come in, so apply as soon as possible. For more information and questions about this position, please contact Thomas Fickenscher at thomas.fickenscher@modelon.com

title: Senior User Experience Designer
description:
**Hungry, Humble, Honest, with Heart.****The Opportunity**As part of the Global Design organization, the design team is seeking a strong Sr. UX designer for our Bangalore, India office. We are looking for someone who is recognized for their design leadership and known for their domain expertise. The successful candidate is someone who is passionate about solving complex problems, is excited by the opportunity to work with a globally distributed design team and can help grow and connect design projects across Nutanix worldwide offices.  

**Engineering / R&D at Nutanix**"Design" and "Customer delight" are embedded into every step of our product cycle. Nutanix, has a design first philosophy that brings consumer-grade design and web-scale engineering together to create an amazing user experience that has only been seen in the consumer world with the likes of Apple and Tesla. Visit our career page to know more about life at Nutanix.  

**Your Role*** Digest problems with high complexity and propose simple, elegant and innovative design solutions.
* Challenge status quo with attention to detail on UX strategy, implementation and micro-interactions
* Has demonstrated an ability to execute, and drive, a variety of design-related activities.
* Facilitate design sprints, workshops and brainstorming sessions
* Motivate and drive consensus across multiple functions (PM, Engineering & Design)
* Define the direction of our flagship product’s design as a part of a multidisciplinary team
* Work with UI development and backend engineering teams to ensure effective execution of designs.
* Compare and contrast feature experience journeys with competing products and influence feature direction in a particular product area.
* Generate customer insights and influence feature direction.
* Own product experience journey for one or more domains within the product.
* Estimate the technical feasibility/ implications of designs and propose solutions leading to convergence.
* Identify gaps/inefficiencies in the design process and contribute to improvements.
* Actively influence decisions on products and solutions through design
Present and communicate design work to all stakeholders, execs and broader teams  
* 

**What You Will Bring****Required skill-set:*** Strong design portfolio demonstrating innovation, craftsmanship and leadership
* A natural leader & passionate designer who can guide multiple designs and team members
* A solid understanding of at least one product domain and developing a good reputation within a company in that domain.
* Work effectively in a fast-moving environment, juggle multiple projects, and prioritize work
* Strong working knowledge of the latest wire-framing/ design and prototyping tools
* Familiar with usability testing (in person and remote), user research, contextual inquiry, interviews, qualitative design analysis, research reporting and design thinking
* Strong written and verbal communication skills
* Able to work cooperatively and communicate effectively
* Stay current on technology trends to inform and inspire modern design.

**Preferred skills:*** Strong interest in data visualization and enterprise software.
* Have working knowledge of accessibility guidelines and best practices.
* HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS3 knowledge, current on the latest responsive design techniques.

**Minimum requirements:*** Bachelor’s degree or advanced degrees (Masters, PhD, etc.) in Design, Interaction design, HCI, or related field with 8+ years experience in enterprise or consumer.
* Experience in the enterprise product industry is preferred.
Passion for design, telling customer stories, and simplifying complex problems  
* 

**About the Team*****About Your Manager:**** Your manager for this role is Shyama Sundar Duriseti, the Technical Director of Design.
* Shyama has extensive experience in designing product experiences and shaping the careers of designers in both enterprise and consumer domains.
* He is the founding designer of one of Nutanix's flagship products and has helped it grow into the 2nd largest revenue generator for the company.

***What The Team Says:**** Shyama is often acknowledged by his team and peers as a calm, focused, and fun-to-work-with designer and leader.
* He is adept at leading teams through challenging requirements and stakeholders to deliver simple, elegant, and innovative solutions.

***How We Work:**** The team works in a hybrid work environment, providing flexibility for collaboration and individual work.
